attributes.action: Resign. Blair you have outstayed your welcome. You have created third world Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nearly 10 years and 10 years of broken promises. Everything is a mess. Iraq war, health service, home office, law and order, smoking ban, immigration, transport, local government. Stay away from public office when you resign. You are a liability to humanity. Resign now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
